scripts.build:all: yarn build:db && yarn build:backends && yarn build:frontends && yarn build:bot
scripts.dev:frontends: concurrently -k -n 'FRONT_MAIN,FRONT_ADMIN,FRONT_LANDING' -c 'green,blue,magenta' "yarn workspace frontend-main dev" "yarn workspace frontend-admin dev" "yarn workspace frontend-landing dev"
scripts.dev:backends: concurrently -k -n 'API,ADMIN' -c 'cyan,magenta' "yarn workspace backend-api start:dev" "yarn workspace backend-admin start:dev"
